TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceProcessInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 安装一个可执行文件，该文件包含扩展 的类。

span.span: Installs an executable containing classes that extend .

summary.span: 该类由安装实用工具（如 InstallUtil.exe）在安装服务应用程序时调用。

span.span: This class is called by installation utilities, such as InstallUtil.exe, when installing a service application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用于可执行文件中的所有服务。The does work common to all services in an executable. 安装实用工具使用它来编写与你要安装的服务相关联的注册表值。It is used by the installation utility to write registry values associated with services you want to install. 若要安装服务，请创建从继承的项目安装程序类 ，并将 类的设置为 `true` 。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from , and set the on the class to `true`. 在项目中， 为每个服务应用程序实例化一个实例，并 为应用程序中的每个服务实例化一个实例。Within your project, instantiate one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 最后，将 实例和实例添加 到项目安装程序类。Finally, add the instance and the instances to your project installer class. 当 InstallUtil.exe 运行时，该实用工具将查找服务程序集中的类，并 将设置为 `true` 。When InstallUtil.exe runs, the utility looks for classes in the service assembly with the set to `true`. 向服务程序集添加类，方法是将它们添加到 与项目安装程序关联的集合中。Add classes to the service assembly by adding them to the collection associated with your project installer. 如果 为 `false` ，则安装实用工具将忽略项目安装程序。If is `false`, the install utility ignores the project installer. 对于实例 ，可以修改的属性包括指定服务应用程序在登录用户以外的其他帐户下运行。For an instance of , properties you can modify include specifying that a service application run under an account other than the logged-on user. 可以指定 运行服务的特定和 对，也可以使用 指定服务在计算机的系统帐户、本地或网络服务帐户或用户帐户下运行。You can specify a particular and pair under which the service should run, or you can use to specify that the service run under the computer's System account, a local or network service account, or a user account. > [!NOTE] > 计算机的系统帐户不是管理员帐户。The computer's System account is not the same as the Administrator account. 通常情况下，你不会在代码中调用方法， 通常仅由安装实用工具调用它们。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用程序会 在安装过程中自动调用和方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 如有必要，它将通过 对所有以前安装的组件调用 (或) 来退出故障。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的，自动维护有关已安装组件的信息 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息会持续更新为 实例，并且每个 实例由实用工具安装。This state information is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 通常不需要让代码显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 实例化 会导致调用基类构造函数 。Instantiating a causes the base class constructor, , to be called. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为 MyProjectInstaller 的项目安装程序，该程序从继承 。The following example creates a project installer called MyProjectInstaller, which inherits from . 假设有一个服务可执行文件，其中包含两个服务： "Hello World Service 1" 和 "Hello World Service 2"。It is assumed there is a service executable that contains two services, "Hello-World Service 1" and "Hello-World Service 2". 在 MyProjectInstaller 的构造函数中 (，该构造函数将由安装实用工具) 调用，为 每个服务创建对象，并为 可执行文件创建一个。Within the constructor for MyProjectInstaller (which would be called by the install utility), objects are created for each service, and a is created for the executable. 若要让安装实用工具将 MyProjectInstaller 识别为有效安装程序，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。For the install utility to recognize MyProjectInstaller as a valid installer, the attribute is set to `true`. 在将安装程序添加到集合之前，在进程安装程序和服务安装程序上设置可选属性 。Optional properties are set on the process installer and the service installers before the installers are added to the collection. 当安装实用工具访问 MyProjectInstaller 时，通过对的调用添加到 集合中的对象 将依次安装。When the install utility accesses MyProjectInstaller, the objects added to the collection through a call to will be installed in turn. 在此过程中，安装程序将保留指示已安装的对象的状态信息，因此，每个对象都可以在安装失败时进行备份。During the process, the installer maintains state information indicating which objects have been installed, so each object can be backed out in turn in case of an installation failure. 通常，不会显式实例化项目安装程序类。Normally, you would not instantiate your project installer class explicitly. 您将创建它并添加 ，但是安装实用工具实际上会调用类，并因此实例化类。You would create it and add the , but the install utility actually calls, and therefore instantiates, the class. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount Account { System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount get(); void set(System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount value); };
member this.Account : System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置运行该服务应用程序时所使用的帐户类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of account under which to run this service application.

value.span: ，它定义系统运行此服务时所使用的帐户类型。

span.span: A that defines the type of account under which the system runs this service.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性为时 `User` ， 和 属性用于定义用于运行服务应用程序的帐户。When the property is `User`, the and properties are used to define an account under which the service application runs. 和 对允许服务在除系统帐户之外的其他帐户下运行。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 例如，如果没有用户登录，则可以允许服务在重新启动时自动启动。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 如果保留 或 为空，并且将设置 为 `User` ，则在安装时系统将提示您输入有效的用户名和密码。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 还可以指定服务在本地系统帐户下运行，或以本地或网络服务运行。You can also specify that the service run under the local system account, or as a local or network service. 有关帐户类型的详细信息，请参阅枚举。See the enumeration for details on types of accounts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (comp As IComponent)

span.span: The that represents the service process.

summary.span: 在没有 类特定行为的情况下实现基类 方法。

span.span: Implements the base class method with no class-specific behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应在代码中调用此方法。This method should not be called within your code. 上的基类方法 为 `abstract` ，因此它是在派生类上实现的。The base class method on is `abstract`, so it is implemented here on the derived class. 但是， 方法的实现中没有特定于类的处理方式。However, there is no class-specific processing in the method's implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取为服务安装选项显示的帮助文本。

span.span: Gets help text displayed for service installation options.

value.span: 帮助文本，提供为在特定帐户下运行服务而设置用户名和密码的步骤说明。

span.span: Help text that provides a description of the steps for setting the user name and password in order to run the service under a particular account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当服务手动启动时，可以使用此帮助文本。This help text can be used when a service starts manually. 它向用户指出如何输入用户名和密码信息。It indicates to the user how to enter user name and password information.

Public Overrides Sub Install (stateSaver As IDictionary)

param.name: stateSaver
param.span: ，包含与安装关联的上下文信息。

summary.span: 将服务应用程序信息写入注册表。

span.span: Writes service application information to the registry.

summary.span: 该方法旨在由自动调用适当方法的安装工具使用。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which call the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，你不会在代码中调用方法， 通常仅由安装实用工具调用它们。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用程序会在 安装过程中自动调用此方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 如果需要，它会通过调用 所有以前安装的组件来退出故障。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on all previously installed components. 此方法将安装传递到基类 方法。This method passes the installation to the base class method. 通常情况下，你不会在 你的代码内调用方法; 通常仅由安装实用工具调用这些方法。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用程序会 在安装过程中自动调用和方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 如果需要，它会通过 对所有以前安装的组件调用 (或) 来退出故障It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的，自动维护有关已安装组件的信息 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 作为参数传递到的此状态信息 `stateSaver` 会不断更新为 实例，并且每个 实例由实用工具安装。This state information, passed into as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 通常不需要让代码显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 向调用方法传递基类方法或 / 事件处理程序引发的任何异常。 passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or / event handlers.

span.span: The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Password : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与运行服务应用程序时所使用用户帐户关联的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets the password associated with the user account under which the service application runs.

value.span: 与运行服务时所使用帐户关联的密码。

span.span: The password associated with the account under which the service should run.
The default is an empty string ("").

value.span: 该属性非公共属性，并且从不序列化。

span.span: The property is not public, and is never serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 对允许服务在除系统帐户之外的其他帐户下运行。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 例如，如果没有用户登录，则可以允许服务在重新启动时自动启动。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 和以 一种安全的方式进行处理，因为它们永远不会序列化或保存到安装状态 (项目安装程序的 ) 或具有公共访问权限的其他位置。 and are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's ) or other location with public access. 设置 并 允许在安装时将帐户自动与服务关联。Setting the and allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time. 如果保留 或 为空，并且将设置 为 `User` ，则在安装时系统将提示您输入有效的用户名和密码。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 在单独的帐户下运行服务的另一种方法是使用计算机的系统帐户。Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account. 该帐户与管理员帐户不同，无需密码。That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password. 系统帐户的权限可能超出了当前登录用户的权限。The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in. 在系统帐户下运行，而不是在用户帐户下运行，可避免由于用户缺少该服务所需的权限而导致的问题Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires 如果 是以外的任何值 `User` ，则将使用指定的帐户 (本地或网络服务，或使用本地系统) ，即使 填充了和属性也是如此 。If is any value other than `User`, the specified account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the and properties are populated.

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which process the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，你不会在代码中调用方法， 通常仅由安装实用工具调用它们。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用程序会在 安装过程中自动调用此方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 如果需要，它会 在生成异常的对象上调用，从而支持故障。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on the object that generated the exception. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的，自动维护有关已安装组件的信息 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 作为参数传递到的此状态信息 `savedState` 会不断更新为 实例，并且每个 实例由实用工具安装。This state information, passed into as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 通常不需要让代码显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 向调用方法传递基类方法或 / 事件处理程序引发的任何异常。 passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or / event handlers.

summary.span: 获取或设置运行服务应用程序时将使用的用户帐户。

span.span: Gets or sets the user account under which the service application will run.

value.span: 运行服务时将使用的帐户。

span.span: The account under which the service should run.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 对允许服务在除系统帐户之外的其他帐户下运行。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 例如，如果没有用户登录，则可以允许服务在重新启动时自动启动。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 和以 一种安全的方式进行处理，因为它们永远不会序列化或保存到安装状态 (项目安装程序的 ) 或具有公共访问权限的其他位置。 and are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's ) or other location with public access. 设置 并 允许在安装时将帐户自动与服务关联。Setting the and allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time. 如果保留 或 为空，并且将设置 为 `User` ，则在安装时系统将提示您输入有效的用户名和密码。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 在单独的帐户下运行服务的另一种方法是使用计算机的系统帐户。Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account. 该帐户与管理员帐户不同，无需密码。That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password. 系统帐户的权限可能超出了当前登录用户的权限。The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in. 在系统帐户下运行，而不是在用户帐户下运行，可避免由于用户缺少该服务所需的权限而导致的问题Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires 如果 是以外的任何值 `User` ，则将使用指定的帐户 (本地或网络服务，或使用本地系统) ，即使 填充了和属性也是如此 。If is any value other than `User`, the specified account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the and properties are populated.
